00068 /*  <em>JarZipUtil.hpp</em> contains functions for extracting a single file from a .jar or .zip archive.
00069     JarZipUtil provides functions for archives stored in the FlashFileSystem (access using filename or file-id) 
00070     and archives represented in BinData-objects.
00071                   
00072     The uncompress algorithm is based on the zlib libray by Mark Adler. The algorithm and the source code
00073     of this library is used nearly unchanged, even we done some replacement of parameters and changed some
00074     data types for less memory usage.
00075     zlib is open source and free to use for anyone, for copyright please read "zlib.h" */
00076 
00077 #if !defined(Apoxi_Unzipper_hpp)
00078 #define Apoxi_Unzipper_hpp
00082 
00083 #include <Auxiliary/BinData.hpp>
00084 typedef UINT8 JarExtractId;
00085 
00086 /*  <em>JVMa_getFileFromJar</em> extracts a file from a jar archive, which is specified by
00087     a file id, representing a file in the FlashFileSystem. The function calls JVMc_getFileFromJarResponse
00088     when finished with extracting.
00089     @param extractionId     an unique id for the request, which is used when calling JVMc_getFileFromJarResponse
00090     @param jarFileId        the id of the zip-file in the flash file system 
00091     @param fileName         the file name of the file to be extracted */
00092 void JVMa_getFileFromJar (JarExtractId extractionId,
00093                           UINT32 jarFileId,
00094                           const char* fileName);
00095 
00096 
00097 /*  <em>JVMa_getFileFromJar</em> extracts a file from a jar archive, which is specified by
00098     a file id, representing a file in the FlashFileSystem. The function calls JVMc_getFileFromJarResponse
00099     when finished with extracting.
00100     @param extractionId     an unique id for the request, which is used when calling JVMc_getFileFromJarResponse
00101     @param jarFileName      the file name of the zip-file in the flash file system 
00102     @param fileName         the file name of the file to be extracted */
00103 void JVMa_getFileFromJar (JarExtractId extractionId,
00104                           const char* jarFileName,
00105                           const char* fileName);
00106 
00107 /*  <em>JVMa_getFileFromJar</em> extracts a file from a jar archive, which is held by a BinData object.
00108     The function calls JVMc_getFileFromJarResponse when finished with extracting.
00109     @param extractionId     an unique id for the request, which is used when calling JVMc_getFileFromJarResponse
00110     @param bin_data         a BinData object containing the binary data of a zip-file
00111     @param fileName         the file name of the file to be extracted */
00112 void JVMa_getFileFromJar (JarExtractId extractionId, BinData* bin_data, const CHAR* fileName);
00113 
00115 class Unzipper {
00116     public:
00118         static BOOLEAN UnzipFfs(UINT32 zip_file_id, const CHAR* file_name, void* *extracted_buffer, UINT32* extracted_buffer_size);
00119 
00121         static BOOLEAN UnzipFfs(const CHAR* zip_file_name, const CHAR* file_name, void* *extracted_buffer, UINT32* extracted_buffer_size);
00122 
00124         static BOOLEAN UnzipBinData(BinData* bin_data, const CHAR* file_name, void* *extracted_buffer, UINT32* extracted_buffer_size);
00125 };
